pricing.faq_q1: Can I change plans at any time?
pricing.faq_a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be applied in your next billing cycle.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text_1: At Pixy, we respect your right to control your personal data. This page explains how you can request the deletion of your information from our platform, including data obtained through integrations with Meta (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp Business).
privacy.intro_text_2: In accordance with Law 1581 of 2012 of Colombia, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union, and the policies of Meta Platforms, Inc., we will process your deletion request in a timely and complete manner.
privacy.intro_list:
• The web application available at app.pixy.com.co
  • The corporate website pixy.com.co
  • Any API, integration, or related service
  • Client portals generated by the platform
privacy.intro_text_3: By using our services, you accept the practices described in this Privacy Policy. We recommend reading it carefully.
privacy.sec_2_list:
• Company Name: Pixy SAS
  • Address: Bogotá D.C., Colombia
  • Email: privacidad@pixy.com.co
privacy.sec_2_text: For any inquiries regarding the processing of your personal data, you can contact us via the email provided.
privacy.sec_3_intro: We collect different types of information depending on how you interact with our platform:
privacy.sec_3_1_list:
• Identification Data: Full name, email, phone number
  • Authentication Data: Encrypted password, session tokens
  • Business Information: Company name, Tax ID, business address
  • Billing Data: Payment method, transaction history
privacy.sec_3_2_list:
• Client Data: Information you store about your own clients in the CRM
  • Communications: Messages sent/received through integrated channels
  • Documents: Quotes, invoices, contracts you generate
  • Attachments: Images, PDF documents, and other uploaded files
privacy.sec_3_3_list:
• IP Address
  • Browser Type and Version
  • Operating System
  • Device Identifiers
  • Pages Visited and Actions Taken
  • Date and Time of Access
privacy.sec_3_4_intro: When you connect your Pixy account with third-party services (Meta/Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp Business), we may receive:
privacy.sec_3_4_list:
• From Meta (Facebook/Instagram):
    • User ID and associated pages
    • Page/account name
    • Messenger and Instagram Direct messages (when authorized)
    • Comments on posts (when authorized)
    • Basic public profile information
  • From WhatsApp Business API:
    • WhatsApp Business phone number
    • Messages sent and received
    • Message delivery status
    • Approved message templates
privacy.sec_3_4_warning: Important: We only access information you explicitly authorize during the account linking process. We do not access personal messages, friends, private photos, or other information not strictly necessary for the service operation.
privacy.sec_3_5_title: 3.5 Use of Meta Data and Specific Permissions
privacy.sec_3_5_text: For Facebook and Instagram integration functionality, Pixy requests specific permissions via Meta OAuth protocol. Below, we detail the exact use of each requested permission:
privacy.sec_3_5_list:
• pages_show_list

    Use: Allows listing Facebook Pages you administer so you can select which ones to connect to Pixy. We do not obtain data from pages you do not explicitly select.

  • pages_manage_metadata

    Use: Allows Pixy to subscribe to your page webhooks to receive real-time incoming message notifications. Essential for conversational CRM functionality.

  • pages_read_engagement

    Use: Allows reading comments and public posts on your connected pages so you can respond from Pixy's unified dashboard.

  • instagram_basic

    Use: Allows reading basic info (name, ID, profile pic) of Instagram professional accounts linked to your Facebook pages, to display them on your dashboard.

  • instagram_manage_messages

    Use: Allows receiving and responding to Instagram Direct messages (DMs) from Pixy interface. Without this permission, the unified inbox feature would not work for Instagram.

  • instagram_content_publish

    Use: Allows publishing content (photos, videos) to your Instagram account only when you schedule or execute a post from Pixy's Marketing module.
privacy.sec_3_5_storage_title: Storage and Security of Meta Data
privacy.sec_3_5_storage_text:
Pixy only stores the Access Token, Page ID, and Page Name to keep the connection active. This data:
  • Is stored encrypted in our secure database.
  • IS NOT shared with third parties, advertisers, or data networks.
  • Is used exclusively to execute actions you request within the platform (e.g., replying to a message).
privacy.sec_3_5_revocation_text:
You can revoke Pixy's access to your Meta data at any time in two ways:
  1. From Pixy settings, disconnecting your accounts.
  2. Directly from Facebook Business Integrations settings.

Upon revocation, our system will delete associated access tokens and immediately lose the ability to read or post to your pages.
privacy.sec_3_6_title: 3.6 AI Policy Compliance and WhatsApp Data
privacy.sec_3_6_text: In strict compliance with "WhatsApp AI Policy 2026" and Meta Tech Provider requirements, PIXY allows the following:
privacy.sec_3_6_list:
• No Training Declaration

    PIXY does not use, process, or share data derived from WhatsApp business solution (including message content, metadata, or user profiles) to train, improve, or feed Large Language Models (LLM), machine learning algorithms, or AI systems, our own or third parties.

  • Data Processor Role

    In the context of WhatsApp Business API data processing, PIXY acts exclusively as a Data Processor. We process information solely under the strict and documented instructions of the Client, who acts as Data Controller.

  • Conversion Attribution

    The user is informed that the ad click identifier (ctwa_clid) received via webhook is collected exclusively for technical attribution, effectiveness measurement, and client marketing campaign optimization. This datum is not used for unauthorized profiling.
privacy.sec_4_intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
privacy.sec_4_list:
4.1 Service Provision

  • Create and manage your user account
  • Provide access to platform features
  • Process your requests and transactions
  • Manage your subscription and billing

4.2 Communication

  • Send notifications about your account and service
  • Respond to your inquiries and support requests
  • Inform you about important service updates
  • Send marketing communications (with your prior consent)

4.3 Service Improvement

  • Analyze usage patterns to improve experience
  • Develop new features
  • Solve technical issues
  • Conduct research and statistical analysis (anonymized data)

4.4 Security and Legal Compliance

  • Protect the platform against fraud and abuse
  • Verify user identity when necessary
  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
  • Respond to legitimate requests from authorities
privacy.sec_5_intro: The processing of your personal data is based on the following legal grounds:
privacy.sec_5_list:
• Contract Execution: Necessary to provide the service you contracted
  • Consent: For marketing communications and certain optional integrations
  • Legitimate Interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud
  • Legal Obligation: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements
privacy.sec_5_text: When processing is based on your consent, you may withdraw it at any time without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.
privacy.sec_6_intro: We may share your information with the following categories of third parties:
privacy.sec_6_list:
6.1 Service Providers

  • Supabase Inc.: Database infrastructure and authentication (USA)
  • Vercel Inc.: Hosting and application distribution (USA)
  • Stripe / Payment Processors: Payment processing (USA/Global)
  • Email Services: Transactional email sending

6.2 Integration Platforms

  • Meta Platforms, Inc.: For Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp Business integrations
  • Twilio Inc.: For messaging services (where applicable)

6.3 Legal Authorities

We may disclose information when required by law, court order, or to protect our legal rights.

We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.sec_7_1_text: When you link your Meta account with Pixy, we use Meta's official API to access only the information you explicitly authorize. Requested permissions depend on the features you want to use:
privacy.sec_7_1_list:
• pages_messaging: To send and receive Facebook Messenger messages
  • instagram_basic: To access basic info of Instagram Business accounts
  • instagram_manage_messages: To manage Instagram Direct messages
  • whatsapp_business_messaging: To send and receive WhatsApp Business messages
privacy.sec_7_1_text_2: You can revoke these permissions at any time from your Meta account settings or Pixy integration section.
privacy.sec_7_2_text:
Data received from Meta is used exclusively to:
  • Display and reply to messages in your unified inbox
  • Associate conversations with client profiles in your CRM
  • Generate communication statistics for your business

We never use Meta data to:

  • Sell or share with unauthorized third parties
  • Create ad profiles without your consent
  • Access information beyond what is authorized
privacy.sec_8_text:
Due to the nature of cloud services, your data may be processed on servers located outside Colombia, primarily in the United States. We guarantee such transfers comply with applicable data protection regulations, including:
  • Using providers that meet international security standards
  • Implementing adequate contractual measures
  • Compliance with frameworks like EU-US Data Privacy Framework where applicable
privacy.sec_9_intro: We retain your personal data for the following periods:
privacy.sec_9_list:
• Active account data: As long as you maintain your active subscription
  • Cancelled account data: 30 days after cancellation, except legally required data
  • Billing data: 5 years per Colombian tax obligations
  • Security logs: 12 months
  • Support communications: 3 years
privacy.sec_9_text: You can request deletion of your data at any time, subject to applicable legal exceptions.
privacy.sec_10_intro: According to Law 1581 of 2012 of Colombia and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union (where applicable), you have the following rights:
privacy.sec_10_list:
• Access: Know what personal data we have about you
  • Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your data (see Deletion Instructions)
  • Opposition: Object to processing of your data in certain circumstances
  • Limitation: Request restriction of processing
  • Portability: Receive your data in a structured, transferable format
  • Consent Revocation: Withdraw your consent where it is the basis for processing
privacy.sec_10_contact:
To exercise any of these rights, send an email to privacidad@pixy.com.co with your request and a copy of your ID.

You can also file a complaint with the Superintendence of Industry and Commerce (SIC) of Colombia if you believe your rights have been violated.
privacy.sec_11_text: Pixy is a business service directed at adults over 18. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If we discover we have collected data from a minor without proper parental consent, we will delete it immediately.
privacy.sec_12_intro: We implement technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your data:
privacy.sec_12_list:
12.1 Technical Measures

  • Data encryption in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256)
  • Two-factor authentication (2FA) available
  • Row Level Security in database
  • Continuous threat monitoring
  • Encrypted and geographically distributed backups

12.2 Administrative Measures

  • Restricted access to authorized personnel
  • Security training for employees
  • Robust password policies
  • Periodic security audits
privacy.sec_13_text:
We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. When we make significant changes:
  • We will update the "Last updated" date at the top
  • Notify you via email if changes are material
  • Post a notice on the platform

We recommend reviewing this policy periodically.
privacy.sec_14_intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or the processing of your data:
privacy.sec_14_footer: We will respond to your request within a maximum of 15 business days.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.intro_text_1: At Pixy, we respect your right to control your personal data. This page explains how you can request the deletion of your information from our platform, including data obtained through integrations with Meta (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp Business).
deletion.intro_text_2: In accordance with Law 1581 of 2012 of Colombia, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union, and the policies of Meta Platforms, Inc., we will process your deletion request in a timely and complete manner.
deletion.option_1_steps:
1. Log in to your account at app.pixy.com.co
  2. Go to Settings → Account → Privacy
  3. Click on 'Delete my account and data'
  4. Confirm your identity with your password
  5. You will receive a confirmation code via email
deletion.option_2_text:
Send an email to privacidad@pixy.com.co with the subject 'DATA DELETION' (mandatory for automatic processing).

  • Description of the data you want to delete (or 'all my data')
deletion.option_3_desc: If you connected your Facebook or Instagram account with Pixy and wish to delete only the data obtained from these platforms:
deletion.option_3_steps:
1. Go to Facebook App Settings
  2. Find 'Pixy' in the list of connected apps
  3. Click 'Remove' and confirm
  4. This will automatically send a deletion request to our system
deletion.sec_3_intro: When you request account deletion, we will delete:
deletion.sec_3_list_1:
• Your user profile (name, email, phone)
  • Access credentials
  • Preferences and settings
deletion.sec_3_list_2:
• Contacts and clients (CRM)
  • Stored communications
  • Generated quotes and invoices
  • Uploaded files
  • Activity history
deletion.sec_3_list_3:
• Access tokens for Facebook/Instagram/WhatsApp
  • Synced messages from these platforms
  • Information of connected pages and accounts
deletion.sec_4_intro: Due to legal obligations, some data may be retained even after your deletion request:
deletion.sec_4_list:
• Billing records: 5 years (Colombian tax obligation)
  • Security logs: 12 months (fraud detection)
  • Data required by court order: As ordered
  • Anonymized data: For statistics (not identifiable)
deletion.sec_4_footer: We will inform you if any of your data falls into these categories and must be retained temporarily.
deletion.sec_5_table:
Request TypeTimeframe
Confirmation of receipt48 hours
Meta Guarantee: Deletion of WhatsApp records and metadataMaximum 30 calendar days (Guaranteed)
Complete deletion from active systems15 business days

deletion.sec_6_intro: If you used Pixy to connect your Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp Business account, we take special measures for this data:
deletion.sec_6_1_text: We have implemented the "Data Deletion Request Callback" required by Meta. When you remove the Pixy app from your Facebook settings:
deletion.sec_6_1_list:
1. Facebook automatically sends us a notification
  2. We delete all data obtained through the Meta integration
  3. We provide you with a confirmation code
  4. You can check the status at the provided URL
deletion.sec_6_2_text:
After requesting deletion, you will receive a link to check the status. The format is:

https://app.pixy.com.co/data-deletion-status?code=YOUR_CODE

This link will be active for 90 days after your request is processed.
deletion.sec_6_3_list:
• Facebook/Instagram User ID
  • Access tokens and refresh tokens
  • Connected page information
  • Stored Messenger and Instagram Direct messages
  • Synced interaction history
  • WhatsApp Business data (numbers, conversations)
deletion.sec_7_intro: Once deletion is complete, you will receive:
deletion.sec_7_list:
• Confirmation email indicating your data has been deleted
  • Reference code for future inquiries
  • Verification URL (for Meta related requests)
deletion.sec_7_footer: We recommend saving the confirmation email for your records.
deletion.sec_8_intro: If you have questions about the data deletion process:
deletion.sec_8_list:
• Email: privacidad@pixy.com.co
  • Suggested subject: "Data Deletion Inquiry"
  • Response time: Maximum 5 business days
deletion.cta_ready_text: Send an email to privacidad@pixy.com.co or go to your account at Settings → Account → Privacy.
